headline: A Look At General Dynamics (GD) Valuation After Earnings Beat And Margin Concerns
summary: Why the earnings beat still rattled General Dynamics investors General Dynamics (GD) delivered a fourth quarter earnings beat, with sales and profit ahead of expectations, yet the stock came under pressure as the market focused on margin strains, higher costs, and softer full year profit guidance. For the quarter ended December 31, 2025, the company reported sales of US$14.379b compared with US$13.338b a year earlier. Net income was US$1.143b versus US$1.148b, while basic earnings per share...
